page.title: 16Entertainment
page.content: The local people in this area for entertainment mainly go to a{Public {house}for either a drink with friends or to play darts or skittles. Fox hunting is held in the area once a year. Many people choose to go into Bristol to watch films or to see plays and to dine at restuarants. For sport many people travel to Thornbury Leisure Centre where a wide selection of games are played. The local school around the area hold evening classes where one can learn for leisure different subjects. There are throughout the year village dances and events for the local people to attend. Of course the main enterainment of most people is either television or radio. This information was gathered by my class 1C and the help of local parents.
